subject: Please respond to your loan application
body:
Dear Homeowner

Are you still paying too much mortgage interest?. Your loan has been approved.

You can receive $262,000 for 
$637 per month.

Please respond Right Now.
http://ilook.tw/c7i2

 


Quinton Philips
Loan Approval Dept


Why does the Air Force need expensive new bombers? Have the people we've been bombing over the years been complaining?	George Wallace
